00029 enum DataType {
00031     UndefinedType = 0,
00033     NumberType = 1,
00035     WStringType = 2,
00037     StringType = 3,
00039     PhoneNumberType = 4,
00041     ProviderType = 5,
00043     DateType = 6,
00045     TimeType = 7,
00047     DateTimeType = 8,
00049     GenericType = 9,
00051     BooleanType = 10
00052 };

00223         union {

00233         } m_val;
